com.exlibris.dps.sdk.techmd

Interface FormatValidationPlugin


  • public interface FormatValidationPlugin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAgent()
      Returns the software agent key compatible with the application key in the application library.
      default java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrorIds()
      Optional: the error IDs of the errors that occurred, if occurred, during the validation.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrors()
      A list of errors that occurred, if occurred, during the validation.
      default java.lang.String getProfile()
      Optional: the validation profile used during the format validation.
      default java.lang.String getValidationDetails()
      Returns further details regarding the format validation when the isValidate and isWellFormed are not sufficient to record the validation results.
      boolean isValid()
      A true/false indicator if the file's format is valid.
      boolean isWellFormed()
      A true/false indicator if the file is well formed.
      boolean validateFormat(java.lang.String filepath)
      Performs a format validation check on a file

    • Method Detail

      • validateFormat

        boolean validateFormat(java.lang.String filepath)
        Performs a format validation check on a file
        Parameters:
        filepath -
        Returns:
        false if failed, true if not

      • getAgent

        java.lang.String getAgent()
        Returns the software agent key compatible with the application key in the application library.
        Returns:
        the application key.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        A true/false indicator if the file's format is valid. If there is no specific implementation, return true.
        Returns:
        validation result if implemented, otherwise true.

      • isWellFormed

        boolean isWellFormed()
        A true/false indicator if the file is well formed. If there is no specific implementation, return true.
        Returns:
        file formed result if implemented, otherwise true.

      • getErrors

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrors()
        A list of errors that occurred, if occurred, during the validation.
        Returns:
        list of error messages

      • getErrorIds

        default java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrorIds()
        Optional: the error IDs of the errors that occurred, if occurred, during the validation.
        Returns:
        list of error IDs corresponding to the error messages

      • getProfile

        default java.lang.String getProfile()
        Optional: the validation profile used during the format validation. This depends on the plug-in implementation and tools used. e.g. veraPDF.
        Returns:
        the validation profile used

      • getValidationDetails

        default java.lang.String getValidationDetails()
        Returns further details regarding the format validation when the isValidate and isWellFormed are not sufficient to record the validation results.
        Returns:
        the validation additional details as a string
